name: Cyborg Goddess
description:
Created by Kara Stone and Kayte McKnight

Cyborg Goddess is a cost-benefit analysis of common sci-fi and fantasy tropes available for women. It hopes to demonstrate future possibilities for women to blur boundaries between single-note archetypes in art history and mass media, for us to be both cyborg and goddess. There can be agentic power in the assemblage of the somatic and the technical.

Inspo: Jasbir Puar on Haraway and Assemblage
